node.title: Aussies clinch dramatic T20 victory over Sri Lanka in Super Over
node.alt: Australian players celebrate a Sri Lankan wicket in the men's T20 international.
node.description: In a thrilling finish, world champions Australia come away with a tense winÂ over Sri Lanka at the SCG, with a Super Over needed to decide the result.
node.content:
["A stunning Josh Hazlewood display in the Super Over has helped Australia to consecutive T20 international wins over Sri Lanka at the SCG.\u00a0", "Hazlewood backed up his figures of 3-22 by conceding just five runs in the Super Over to quell any hope of a Sri Lanka win on Sunday night.", "The biggest concern for Australia out of the match, however, was a possible injury to Steve Smith.", "Smith dived to take a catch on the boundary rope before landing awkwardly and appearing to sustain a concussion in the final regulation over.", "", "
Medical staff attend to Steve Smith after he injured himself fielding.(Getty Images: Mark Kolbe)
", "In front of a crowd of 6,305, Sri Lanka needed 12 off three balls to chase down the total of 165 when Maheesh Theekshana hit Marcus Stoinis for six off his very first delivery.", "Smith went to flick the ball back into the field of play but he landed directly on his temple.", "Smith went off for treatment\u00a0before Dushmantha Chameera tied the scores by hitting the last ball for four.", "Josh Inglis (48) proved the best of Australia's batters, and Sri Lanka was\u00a0sluggish in its\u00a0response before the visitors\u00a0began to get on top through Pathum Nissanka (73) and captain Dasun Shanaka late in the innings.", "Nissanka survived until the last over with his side needing 19 off the last six balls.", "All hope seemed lost when he was picked off by Pat Cummins but Theekshana had different ideas.", "Smith was unable to stop him and Chameera sent the game to a Super Over.", "", "
Marcus Stoinis hit the winning runs for Australia.(AAP: Brendon Thorne)
", "Hazlewood's economical bowling, conceding just five runs, then kept Sri Lanka at bay with Stoinis leading Australia to victory with the bat, crashing two boundaries.", "The two sides are next in action when they travel to Canberra on Tuesday.", "AAP"]
